org.mvp4j.adapter
Class ModelComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.mvp4j.adapter.ModelComponent

public abstract class ModelComponent
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to simplify updating model for a given component during implementing an adapter class MVPAdapter to a specific library.

The user can use the field modelBinding of type ModelBinding to add the change event to the current view component and call the setPropertyValue to update the current property in the model. Example with JTextField component in Swing adapter : public class JTextFieldModelComponent extends ModelComponent{ JTextField textField; private PropertyChangeListener listener; private ModelBinding modelBinding; public JTextFieldModelComponent(ModelBinding modelBinding) { super(modelBinding); textField = (JTextField)modelBinding.getComponent(); }

Constructor Summary

abstract  void bind()
          Bind the current component with the current model Add the change event to the current view component and call the setPropertyValue to update the current property in the model when the event is called
abstract  Converter getConverter()
          The ModelComponent can define it's specific converter to customize the data conversion.
 ModelBinding getModelBinding()
          Get the field to get all binding informations between component and model and useful methods to interact with current property in the model.
 void init(ModelBinding modelBinding)
          initialize the modelComponent with the necessary parameters
abstract  void setConverter(Converter converter)
          Modify the current specific converter of the modelComponent used to convert data in component in order to update the model
abstract  void unbind()
          Unbind the current component with the current model, remove the event added by the method bind
